meanings: a piece, a bit, a fragment. (→조각)

vlive.korean: 진짜 한 조각이 없어? Wait, really? You don't have a piece? 듣기 View video NCT : 쟌맠의 불시착
vlive.english: Wait, really? You don't have a piece?

vlive.korean: 훨씬 낫다 - 한 조각이 없어서... All right. That's much better. - We don't have the piece... You just like... 듣기 View video NCT : 쟌맠의 불시착
vlive.english: All right. That's much better. - We don't have the piece... You just like...

vlive.korean: [주문 완료! 페퍼로니와 치즈 한 조각씩] 페퍼로니 하나 치즈 하나 맞아요? [All done! One pepperoni and one cheese] One pepperoni and one cheese? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “디패에게 10달러를 받았습니다” 간식편 (있지 : ITZY)
vlive.english: [All done! One pepperoni and one cheese] One pepperoni and one cheese?

vlive.korean: 야 한 조각 해봐! Cut a piece! 듣기 View video SF9 : 찬희휘영
아~ 이 한 조각이 아니라 한 입? It's not this piece, but one bite?? 듣기 View video SF9 : 찬희휘영
vlive.english: It's not this piece, but one bite??

examples.korean: We will sift every scrap of evidence. 발음듣기 우리는 단 한 조각의 증거도 면밀히 조사할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We will sift every scrap of evidence. 발음

examples.korean: Slice a piece off. 발음듣기 한 조각 잘라 내어라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

a thick slice of bread 발음듣기 두툼한 빵 한 조각 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a thick slice of bread 발음
